title: Everyone's Loving This Street Style Trend From NYFW
content: Seen in every direction at Fashion Week , culottes are making big waves on the streets of New York, and we're crazy in love with how the uberstylish are outfitting them. Paired with the prettiest blouses, a structured blazer, or an oversize shirt, there are so many ways to wear the next trend that's about to blow up. Scroll through for all the style snaps, then shop the look.
